description: Slack integration for team communication, notifications, and workflow automation

slack.description: Slack workspace integration for communication and automation

required.name: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN
required.description: Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-)
required.scope: Bot permissions for channels, users, and messages
howToGenerate: 2. Create new app or select existing app

required.name: SLACK_APP_TOKEN
required.description: Slack App-level Token (starts with xapp-) for socket mode
howToGenerate: 1. In your Slack app settings, go to Basic Information

optional.name: SLACK_WORKSPACE_ID
optional.description: Your Slack workspace ID for workspace-specific operations
optional.howToFind: Found in your Slack workspace URL or through API

capabilities: Send messages to channels and direct messages
Access user profiles and workspace information
securityConsiderations: Store tokens securely in environment variables
Use minimal required scopes for bot functionality
Regularly audit bot permissions and access
Implement rate limiting for bot messages
Monitor bot usage for unusual activity
Use workspace admin controls for bot management

commonIssues.cause: Missing channel permissions or bot not invited
commonIssues.solution: Invite bot to channel or add necessary scopes (channels:write, chat:write)

commonIssues.cause: Invalid app token or missing connections:write scope
commonIssues.solution: Verify app token is correct and has connections:write scope
Implement message queuing and respect rate limit headers

commonIssues.cause: Missing file permissions or size limits
commonIssues.solution: Add files:write scope and check file size limits (1GB max)

examples.description: Send deployment notification to team channel
examples.prompt: Send a notification to #deployments channel about successful production deployment of version 2.1.0
Create and post a daily standup summary based on recent activity and team updates
Monitor error logs and send alerts to #alerts channel for critical issues
Summarize feedback from recent pull request reviews and share with the team
